author: wn.com
title: Art of the Zo: Textiles from Myanmar, India, and Bangladesh (Philadelphia Museum of Art)
text: ( Source : Philadelphia Museum of Art ) The Philadelphia Museum of Art presents an exhibition of woven textiles made by the Zo peoples of South Asia , including works that range from ceremonial tunics and wrap skirts to mantles, capes,
